#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;

int func(vector<pair<int,int> >v,int *a,int n,int k)
{
sort(a,a+n);
sort(v.begin(),v.end());
int i=0,j=0,ans=0;
while(i<n&&j<k)
{
if(a[i]>=v[j].first&&a[i]<=v[j].second)
{
i++;
ans++;
}
else if(a[i]<v[j].first)
i++;
else if(a[i]>v[j].second)
j++;
}
return ans;
}

int main()
{
ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
int n,k;
cin>>n>>k;
int a[n];
vector<pair<int,int> >v;
for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
cin>>a[i];
for(int i=0;i<k;i++)
{
int x,y;
cin>>x>>y;
if(x<y)
v.push_back(make_pair(x,y));
else
v.push_back(make_pair(y,x));
}
cout<<func(v,a,n,k)<<endl;
return 0;
}
